descriptionHtml:
[size=2][img]http://i.imgur.com/yyVwTBy.jpg[/img]


Many people asked me about a preset with Cirie so there She is!



[b][u][color=#ffe599][size=3]Installation[/size][/color][/u][/b]:

[color=#f9cb9c]Step 1[/color]
Install all [color=#b6d7a8]required mods[/color] listed below. Remember to read all description and installation guides for this mods. Some of them require also other mods.

[color=#f9cb9c]Step 2[/color]
Copy the file (_4_commonTriRaces.slot) to [color=#b6d7a8]Documents[/color]\[color=#b6d7a8]My Games[/color]\[color=#b6d7a8]Skyrim[/color]\[color=#b6d7a8]CME_Save[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c]Step 3[/color]
Type in the game - showracemenu, then choose Body Tab > [color=#b6d7a8]Slot Load[/color] > [color=#b6d7a8]Next[/color] > [color=#b6d7a8]Slot 4

[/color]

[u][b][color=#ffe599][size=3]Required Mods[/size][/color][/b][/u]:

[/size][list][*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?][size=2]Enhanced Character Edit[/size][/url][/b]
[*][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url][/b] or [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB[/url][/b] Body[/size]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?][size=2]SG Female Textures Renewal [/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?][size=2]SG Female Eyebrows[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][size=2]The Eyes Of Beauty[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?][size=2]Seductive Lips HD[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?][size=2]Smile in HD[/size][/url][/b]
[*][size=2][b]SG Hair Pack 268[/b] by HelloSanta (Google it)[/size]
[/list]
[b][color=#f9cb9c]Also many thanks to authors of this mods[/color][/b][size=2]![/size]



[b][u][color=#ffe599][size=3]ENB's used for ScreenShots[/size][/color][/u][/b][size=2]:[/size]

[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62884/?][b][size=2]Tranquility ENB _ ExtendedFX[/size][/b][/url]
[*][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338/?]K ENB Pure Light[/url][/b][/size]
[/list]

[b][u][color=#ffe599][size=3]Permissions[/size][/color][/u][/b][size=2]:[/size]
[size=2]Please DO NOT reupload this presets on any other sites, it is Nexus Exclusive.[/size]
